raw_html:

body:
A full accident investigation report was published on 23 October 2006 for this incident and can also be viewed on this website.  
[Star Princess investigation report](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/investigation_reports/2006/star_princess.cfm)

  
Fire on board the Bermuda registered cruise ship Star Princess on 23 March 2006. Issued 27 April 2006.
